NAP projects require Visual C++ redistributable packages to be installed.

Error message DLL: MSVCP140.DLL
Missing redistributable: Visual Studio 2015, 2017 and 2019
Download: https://aka.ms/vs/16/release/vc_redist.x64.exe

Error message DLL: VCOMP120.DLL
Missing redistributable: Visual Studio 2013
Download: https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=40784
